stories.text:
I am a SDE with 4 YOE in India. For a long time, I have been considering emigrating via the computer science masters route.

I have never been to Canada or USA and between them where do you think it would be more sensible to emigrate to?

With the assumption that the quality of education would be mostly similar, here's a gist of the comparison.

- Canada offers an easier path to PR and then Citizenship. I also have friends there.

- USA offers more and high paying SWE jobs and the duration of a MS course can be 1 to 1.5yr which would mean I wouldn't have to take a big education loan.

However, OPT only guarantees 3 years of life in states. H1B is a lottery. Green card is not possible.
stories.title: Ask HN: MS in Canada or USA?
